data.text: @shaunviljoen @gillianoberholzer Shaun and I spoke about this, we will have a look at a later stage. For now, Ash shouldn't use this feature for the Bulk requests but use the old way of asking XDS for the data. It wasn't designed for that purpose but merely as an added benefit for grouped searches. They combine different types of searches so not all results have address history, i.e. CIPC Director.
